name: The Cow Festival
description:
Tomorrow is the annual Cow Festival, but something strange is happening. A loud noise jolts you awake. Hurry to your cow Betsy's side and get swept up in a conspiracy that's out of this world. 

The Cow Festival is a tiny adventure game with branching paths.

A single playthrough will only take about 15 minutes. Can you find the secret ending?

Features
  • 8 endings to find
  • Love your adorable cow
  • Discover the truth
In Development

This game is mostly finished but might still have a couple bugs. Feel free to let me know if you find any.
